text: Didier Pasgrimaud (23 February 1966 - 29 January 2021) was a French cyclist. He competed in the team pursuit event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. He was born in Châteaubriant, France. Pasgrimaud died on 29 January 2021 in Châteaubriant at the age of 54. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:2021 deaths Category:French cyclists Category:Olympians for France Category:People from Loire-Atlantique Category:Sportspeople from Pays de la Loire
title: Didier Pasgrimaud
